amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to make technical and conforming changes; add a new title which inserts new provisions on reinsurance coverage for qualified reinsurance programs; and to insert provisions requiring a study on the need for conditional coverage of commercial residential lines of insurance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klein (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 159 (Roll no. 1068).
